website_summaries.verdict: While you'll love the sets' affordable price and ability to make grilled and crispy dishes, the cooking capacity is not practical for all cooks or occasions.
pros: The ceramic-coated basket and cookie sheet set is a unique cooking tool that is ideal for preparing quick grilled or fried meals on the stove top or in the oven
Great for use on the grill too
cons: The  8.7- by 11.9-inch basket is not spacious enough for cooking large portions
Stuck-on food on the cookie sheet has been reported

customer_reviews.title: I love fried foods
customer_reviews.text: I love fried foods, but my cholesterol doesn't. Figured we would try it even though it gets mixed reviews. It works just like it says, with some things you have to leave the food cooking a little longer to get nice and crispy, but it's a learning curve. Cleans very easy, nothing seems to stick to it, even cheese.
customer_reviews.author: EMM

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this product ....
customer_reviews.text: I used the pan to bake some chicken. The drippings burned and stuck to the pan. When I used a plastic spatula to try to scratch it off, the copper came off. I probably did something wrong somewhere, but if it's that easy to ruin, I won't be buying Copper Chef again.
customer_reviews.author: TH123

customer_reviews.title: Deceitful advertising
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong was the size. Advertised as 15.75" x 14", the real size is 12,5" x 9.5". Quality is good, advertising is deceitful. Surprised Amazon would accept this kind of advertising.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY WHITNEY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Food stuck to pan very first time, impossible to clean. Try to return.
customer_reviews.author: Big Guy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this Broiler Pan
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE this pan. I broiled cheese stuffed sausages wrapped in bacon in this pan. Some of the cheese leaked out and landed in the grid of the basket and also towards the bottom of this pan. Naturally the cheese was somewhat scorched.. I could NOT believe how easy the clean up was. I wiped with a paper towel and all of it slid right off...all the burnt on cheese!!! I then washed it in soapy water and it was sparkling! This pan is truly remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly well with my Breville Smart Oven Pro
customer_reviews.text: I have a large smart oven from Breville, the one that does convection but predates the "air" model. So i bought this to make up for the lack of air fry function and you know what? convection bake or roast with this works just as well! ive made quite a few things such as tater tots and hashbrowns and they all turn out evenly crisp and delicious chicken wings are great too, sort of a midway between baked and fried though but im okay with that since i used no oil a must have if you have the same oven as mine!
customer_reviews.author: EvilTechie

customer_reviews.title: OK for frozen potatoes - but not for actual cooking.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT non-stick. It's fine for frozen potatoes, but when I used it to cook some chicken drumsticks (just using a dry rub, no bbq or other sauce) the skin of the chicken stuck to the wire mesh. I scrubbed, soaked overnight in hot soapy water, scrubbed again, soaked again, scrubbed again, then took these pictures. The lower tray is also hard to clean. It is very lightweight and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly 760

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because a friend recommended it. When it came, it was only packed in a single tight-fitting box which had been smashed. One wire handle was snapped. Upon closer inspection, the pan and basket were found to be rather lightweight and flimsy. I chose not to ask for a replacement, but instead for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks to item.
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to like this item when I got it for my breville smart oven it fit perfectly however after using it a few time I noticed the food juices were sticking to pan and discoloring it very bad plus noticed the coating on both pan and basket were peeling away. It’s so ugly and disgusting looking. I can’t even scrape the dried juices off after soaking in hot soapy water for a few days I’m so frustrated. Stay away from this item or cry for as long as you own it. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Huge_turtle_head

customer_reviews.title: I only like that it does not leave food cooking in oil
customer_reviews.text: This product does not leave food crispy. I only like that it does not leave food cooking in oil. If it wasn't to late I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Love

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Quality Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap toaster basket and I am disappointed in the quality. The tray had a ding meaning it got hit hard and the box had a hole in it! Add to that, the basket itself was flimsy and bent at the bottom. I pushed it back up but, still dented. Not returning it but, I bought a better grill which was stainless and a tray that stained (probably should have seasoned it) separately. I will buy one more of each one. This one is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Virgilio

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I used my Copper Chef Copper Crisper for the first time today. Although the concept is great...I am not happy with the clean up! After one use, there are stains on the bottom tray that will not clean off. One use!
customer_reviews.author: D. Beatty

customer_reviews.title: This works great for cooking fish sticks or popcorn shrimp or french fries.
customer_reviews.text: It also does a pretty nice job with cooking chicken etc... But it has two problems. One, it is very small. I didn't realize when watching the videos that they weren't cooking breasts, thighs etc... They were cooking chicken wings. So, it will hold four chicken thighs. Second, food gets stuck in the basket and it is a fit to clean it out. Cooked fish filets in this and they cooked fine, but pieces were stuck to basket. Cleaning the basket when it has pieces stuck is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: NCBeach

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with this at all
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this, I made BBQ chicken. I even sprayed the basket part, and the sauce still stuck on it. I soaked it, and even used a brush on it. Then I put it through the dish washer, and still had parts on it. The tray permanently stained, but at least the BBQ sauce came off after I soaked it. Not satisfied with this at all, however it does warm up pizza well. Not at all as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Trash after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this and used it the same night in my brivelle air fryer with 5 chicken wings. The tray stained and color changed and copper came of the basket. I soaked it for about 10 minutes it came clean but looks a mess. I am so disappointed. I saw so many great reviews. The one I received was poorly made trash and I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: Much much much smaller than I anticipated. Also, after cleaning the product actually stained from what I cooked. I’m getting more and more weary of copper chef products. First it was the frying pan’s that started to lose/chip costing even with using silicone and wooden utensils, now this! This will be the last product I purchase from copper chef.
customer_reviews.author: C L

customer_reviews.title: bottom tray warped when used alone
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to try the tray and basket as toaster oven accessories. Sadly the bottom try warps when used to bake on. Don't be fooled by the name. The metal copper is not present on these items. Copper only describes the color. The basket and tray work well together to cook prepared frozen foods crispy, with no warping when used together. Size is fine for 1-2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item with the intention of using it for one reason only. Making fries in a regular oven. Using (Ore Ida Extra Crispy Fast Food). They cook a couple of minutes quicker and are perfect when you take them out of the oven. Great buy! Not our first piece of Copper product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our cooking arsenal. Does what it advertises & clean up is easy. Will oder in larger sizes & also as gifts to others. My sons have used it constantly even when reheating food instead of the microwave because the outcome is so much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Tru

customer_reviews.title: Small but good size for handling.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Work just as they say and the "chips" are yummy--a different way to eat a potato or sweet potato. I used olive-oil spray first and these were easy to clean. They are small. I bought two and that covers one huge potato. But, the size makes them easy to wash, so they work for me. I'm thinking of buying two more so I can do two potatoes at once. I looked at larger ones, but this brand/type seemed like the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: KathyS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the crisper. The copper coating of the pan stains very easily and will come off when cleaning with plastic cleaning pads. Food residue sticks to the mesh tray and is almost impossible to clean without removing the copper coating also. Definitely not non-stick. Complete waste of money. I tossed the pan and tray after only 4 uses. Going back to regular trays lined with aluminum foil.
customer_reviews.author: Terry R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good news is that it worked
customer_reviews.text: Used this for fries and rings. Used foil liner for tray and sprayed lightly. Good news is that it worked. Bad is that it's anything but no-stick, and surface deteriorates slightly with each use. Also picked up a branded twin @Aldi's for exactly half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diogenes

customer_reviews.title: Stay away. Copper colored pan that wears out easily.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve included a picture of my pan. My pan is always tinfoil lined, it’s spotless but as you can see from the weight of tater totes on foot of the crisper tray is wearing out a spot on the pan. It’s barely been 6 weeks and I’m past my 30 days return with Amazon. Emailed customer service and it’s the basic run around to get this replaced under this manufacturer warranty. This is defiantly not recommended. If I could could give it negative stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Mrleed

customer_reviews.title: Use them all the time
customer_reviews.text: Great way to cook in my oven cause I don't have to turn food over cause it gets cooked evenly on both sides. Read where some complained about leaving marks on the tray. Big deal, nobody sees them and they don't interfere with how good the product turns out. Besides to me they aren't that noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Rose E. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this pan for heating frozen foods like french fries, tator tots, pizza rolls, etc. Foods cook evenly and are crispy just as advertised. You do need to be careful when moving the pan in or out of the oven using only one hand. If you try holding both the pan and the tray from the handle side the pan will flip up, however, if you hold both from the long side they remain stable.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I loved this crisper set at first. I used it to roast cubed butternut squash, sliced potatoes, asparagus, etc. It did a great job. Until I noticed that the "copper" coating started coming off on the food. I am not interested in eating "copper" coating. I have replaced them with 100% stainless steel mesh baking racks.
customer_reviews.author: EBK

customer_reviews.title: Good but extremely hard to clean, things stick to it!
customer_reviews.text: I work so well enough but I have no idea where people get that it's easy to clean and things don't stick?! The basket is a nightmare to clean when cooking chicken or bacon...at times I've spent over 10 mins scrubbing after soaking. I do not see how anyone with an ounce of integrity can make a comment like "nothing sticks to it"...do not believe this statement
customer_reviews.author: James R French

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how great this product is! I can't believe how easy it cleans up!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and frustration this is for frozen foods baking
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product but was disappointed on the small size. This size is meant for one person serving. Also the food pictures on the site are frozen prepared foods. This isn’t meant for someone who makes chicken nuggets from scratch. This product stained black from food that dripped and burnt. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: CCHernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Not non-stick. Was supposed to be able to use on grill, food stuck to it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Shea

customer_reviews.title: Small Flimsy POS
customer_reviews.text: This basket is a POS. It is very fragile, very small and very expensive. It also came with heavy damage to it and the box. It came in the display box without being put into a shipping box and it was crushed when it got here. It looks like a toy basket for a kids oven you would pay a dollar for.
customer_reviews.author: Grillmaster

customer_reviews.title: I love most of them except this one (and XL Bacon ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought many of Copper Chef products (Copper Chef 5 piece 11" Deep Square Frying Pan, 9.5 Inch Skillet, Induction Cooktop..etc.). I love most of them except this one (and XL Bacon Crisper Set). The bottom tray was not able to be cleaned as the rest of the products. The black marks were not able to be removed. Very disappointed !! Can someone tell me how to clean them?
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tray
customer_reviews.text: This tray works well for air frying. The copper finish is very easy to clean. I just wish I had bought the larger size. there are some areas of the undersurface of the lip of the tray that is that copper finish isn't perfect on, but it doesn't affect the functionality or look (you have to really look for it). I have only hand washed mine and no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: S H

customer_reviews.title: Not a Non-Stick Pan
customer_reviews.text: Not Recommended Purchase: While the initial purchase of this little copper based "crisper" pan seemed great, after cooking chicken wings in the pan 2 times it ruined the pan, the spatter became baked into the pan during the second cooking and will not come out without ruining the coating. So.. NO its not the Non-Stick pan it says it is. I've soaked the pan in Amonia, which usually pulls baked on crap off of a pan, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: jnsnfl

customer_reviews.title: Copper Chief Crisper is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition. It's the perfect size. It cleans easily, even in the dishwasher Now there is no need to turn the food half way thru cooking. Just another step to making life just a little easier!
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Gray

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: We didn't see any size dimensions listed when we bought it. We went with how it looked on TV, and we were way surprised! Very small! If you wanted to cook bacon in the oven, it might cook 5 pieces. Cook French fries...probably enough for 1 person. We sent it back in early Feb. and are still waiting for money re-imbursement.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product.
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve baked chicken wings. Tater Tots. Fish sticks. Lol I intend to use more. But love it. It is hard to grab with pot holder from oven. Not enough lip to the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Toodles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for cooking & baking
customer_reviews.text: Gotham cookware is the BEST ! Nothing sticks to it, and clean-up is a breeze. Put your breaded or sauce-glazed chicken in the basket; put it in the oven; heat circulates evenly around the food, and any drips get caught in the tray under the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Joey the K

customer_reviews.title: This fits perfectly in my toaster/convection oven.
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly in my toaster/convection oven. I have the size you can toast six slices of bread at once.
customer_reviews.author: Sus

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were larger
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit smaller than it appears in the advertisement but it does the job. The rack allows my food to cook without having to turn it over which is great. When I reheat fried chicken, it's nice and crispy same with frozen french fries.
customer_reviews.author: KLo

customer_reviews.title: THE IDEA IS GREAT FOR COOKING BOTH SIDES AT THE SAME TIME WITHOUT ...
customer_reviews.text: ALL THE HIGH CLASS ADVERTISEMENT NOTHING STICKS JUST WIPE CLEAN. THE IDEA IS GREAT FOR COOKING BOTH SIDES AT THE SAME TIME WITHOUT HAVING TO TURN OVER. FOOD STICKS ON THE WIRES AND IS DIFFICULT TO GET CLEAN. THE BOTTOM PAN AFTER 8 TIMES OF USE HAS SPOTS BURNED WHERE FOOD HAS DRIPPED DOWN AND WILL NOT WAS OFF, SO MUCH FOR JUST WIPE CLEAN
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Get two.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for french fries, breaded chicken, onion rings and anything else I want crispy top and bottom. You just can't beat it. I also appreciate how lightweight it is. Clean up is a breeze. It is large enough to bake a meal for the two of us. I may just buy another one for larger meals. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A truly wonderful product, especially for we seniors
customer_reviews.text: A truly wonderful product, especially for we seniors. It does what it is supposed to do and you don't have to bother turning the food. It works on both sides and the food is done in half the time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sauder

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing "copper" about this item.
customer_reviews.text: Copper colored coating only. Coating flakes off with minimal use. If you make sure there are no coating flakes then you can still use it. It does work, coating or no coating. Never experienced any "non-stick" attributes. I use the pan only in my counter top air fryer oven because it fits.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: It is reasonably easy to clean but you have to use a brush ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Crisper time and again for various items I have purchased in the frozen food section or food I bread myself. It is reasonably easy to clean but you have to use a brush on the grates. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought it would be but works great for getting airfryer results from my convection oven
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be but works great for getting airfryer results from my convection oven. Perfect for an entree or fries for two or reheating pizza or egg rolls. My first Copper Chef product and I must say it lives up to the hype. True nonstick surface and scratch resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great solution to healthier cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution to healthier cooking. We use it at least three times a week. Typical things that you would fry in a pan, we can bake using this pan and everything is crisp and the best part is no oil. Very easy to clean but a little on the small side. I wish they made a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Sending it back.
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pieces of Copper Chef cookware and they work fine. This piece, not so much. Used it just once to cook frozen chicken fingers. Tried cleaning the small amount of grease that remained in the pan, and although most of it disappeared, many spots were left. This stuff is supposed to be non-stick. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal guy

customer_reviews.title: Impedes Heat
customer_reviews.text: Stops heat from reaching the underside. While it will keep your oven clean, the heat will not get to the food properly to "fry" it.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: get ready to replace all your pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans are the best! With the crisper, you get two for one because the sheet pan is so useful on it's own. This is a much healthier way to cook without having to use oil. I've replaced all my French cookware (yup, I do a lot of cooking!) with these pots and pans. Sometimes I use a little water instead of oil when I cook certain foods.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: It’s dirty!!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this item today & it appears to have food residue on the mesh pan throughout..I have one & love it so much, I wanted another for our summer home.Used is one thing ...Dirty is unacceptable😡
customer_reviews.author: Fran@Wloo

customer_reviews.title: A good job!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. Made pork chops, a bit leery about the time factor, but I just paid attention and was most happy with the end result. Moist, nicely browned, just seasoned with salt, pepper and garlic powder. I only cook for one or two people so the nice was perfect for my needs. A short pamphlet with a few recipes or just temperature guidelines would be helpful. Will certainly recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: alexa.

customer_reviews.title: A clever idea
customer_reviews.text: It works as described and I have used the basket to oven fry chicken and bacon a number of times. The problem is the tray is getting some dark spots on it that I cannot clean off, most often when cooking bacon in the oven. Since abrasives cannot be used, I think that I am stuck with a discolored pan.
customer_reviews.author: MissA

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great look and quality is awesome but I needed something much bigger. Other than the size, this was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: janelle acain

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept, Poor Execution
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the "air-fry" basket. Not so much. However, it's still a really handy pan and basket. We use the basket for draining and the pan for catching droppings. We have used it for making sweet potato fries but they aren't crisp (but they're still tasty).
customer_reviews.author: TLF

customer_reviews.title: This pan is a good idea. I ruined my nice baking rack oven ...
customer_reviews.text: This pan is a good idea. I ruined my nice baking rack oven frying chicken. The pan is extremely tiny, like 12 inches. You have to cook 2 or 3 batches to feed your family. On a good note. The rack fits in my convection oven so I oven fry in that. Even less mess. MAKE A BIGGER PAN! Your little pan hold 10 small chicken wings with the ends cut off!
customer_reviews.author: pattisun

customer_reviews.title: The copper flakes
customer_reviews.text: Loved using this all the time, but now the copper is flaking off the edges of the crisper. The tray has discolored and hard to clean, have to use aluminum foil on the tray and cleaning is then easier. Would I buy again, probably.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This pan works well. It does make things crisp. We generally use it for single layer items only. Mostly used for chicken strips. Used once for fries as shown in ad picture and it worked pretty well. It is non stick but any grease that that drops on pan underneath while cooking tuns black and STAINS permanently.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: You could do better
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for a few months in that time the pan is stained from drippings and is no longer nonstick The basket does help cook fries faster but the copper is falling off, I think if I used my dishwasher on the basket it would be entirely silver after1 cycle I think I would rather have stainless
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1 for me and bought 1 for my neighbor. At first it was ok, but as I cooked more, it started to stick and got harder to clean. I do not use it as much now.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Just horrible. Tried baking my Christmas duck on it and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just horrible. Tried baking my Christmas duck on it and it took almost 3 times longer to cook and it stained badly. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: karla pirillo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for re-heating
customer_reviews.text: We are planning on getting a 2nd one. We also used it to cook brats & hot dogs under the broiler.
customer_reviews.author: JABischoff

customer_reviews.title: Copper Chef Crisper Tray – Non Stick Cookie Sheet Tray
customer_reviews.text: The box with a sleazy box like in a retail store. No protection. The pan and the grill were both bent. I don't even think there was any copper anything. It looked like it was spray painted. Awful. Sent it back within 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MarcoMarks

customer_reviews.title: Falling in love! Just wish it was a bit bigger for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought fried chicken from weis it was soggy by the time I got home. Reheated on air crisper and it crisper right up! Falling in love! Just wish it was a bit bigger for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Turttletamer

customer_reviews.title: Basket was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Roasted a pork loin in the Breville Smart Oven Air and the Copper Chef Crisper Tray was easy to clean. I paid full price for the Copper Chef Crisper Tray. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sandyTop Contributor: Bread Making

customer_reviews.title: The crisper tray is decent- the pan is garbarage
customer_reviews.text: It isn't clear to me why they would provide a low-grade tray to go with the crisper tray- it makes no sense. After the first use of the device, the sheet pan stain and they aren't coming out. I wouldn't purchase this from Copper Chef again
customer_reviews.author: bluemoon219

customer_reviews.title: Big waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So very dissapointed in this item. I went to use this for the first time last night to bake some french fries when I poured the fries in the backet and went to place it on the tray both handled broke off. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Have to turn food to brown on both sides but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: First of all the pan can only hold 6 pieces of chicken. Chicken was great on top but didn’t brown on the bottom. I had to turn the chicken over. After I did that it was great. Cookie sheet rinsed of with water but clean the basket right away. Price was great. I will probably get a second one to cook more food at one time. I don’t mind turning the food over.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a must!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. Frozen things like corn dogs and French fries cook perfectly on this!
customer_reviews.author: April Diana

customer_reviews.title: Functional but has a design and/or manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and easy to clean... but the mesh basket loudly warps at oven temperatures and then sits askew. Goes back to its original shape when it cools. I think the basket feet expand so they’re wider than the roasting pan but it’s always too hot and messy to assess when it’s cockeyed. First time it happened I thought some catastrophic failure had occurred but have now learned to expect it.
customer_reviews.author: Educated beyond my intelligence

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These are quite thin, and will flex under heat. Williams Sonoma has their offering in the Gold Touch series, and I would strongly recommend investing in that brand instead of this one. But if you want something cheap, and intend to throw it away after a few uses, it may be OK.
customer_reviews.author: MrCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Gift for mom
customer_reviews.text: It was bought as a gift for my mom to use in her convention oven. She said it works great when she used it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: does not crisp fried
customer_reviews.text: does not work as stated, the fries did not crisp as stated. disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Gail Golden

customer_reviews.title: Keep Tray Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is my second copper chief. Seems I used my first one so much, I had to replace it. TRY TO CLEAN TRAY AS WELL AS POSSIBLE, THE OIL DOES BUILD UP.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Things cook nicely without having to turn
customer_reviews.text: It is working as advertised. Things cook nicely without having to turn. Wish there would have been some directions and recipes included. It would be nice to know the times and temps to set when using. So you just have to guess and experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected so will not be able tomfoolery what I had planned on tonight!!!Will up date review tomorrow on how it cooks.was hoping for more recipe ideas but on includes a small list of things like frozen Fry's and frozen pizza....Now I see why the company is doing a buy 1 get 1 free if you order from them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size is small
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I didn’t read the size because this thing is small, like can’t cook a whole bag of French fries small. The day I got it, I used just the bottom sheet, and it came out of the oven warped. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret I Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: True crisper.
customer_reviews.text: A true crisper. Fish sticks and fries come out so crispy without the use of any oil.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McConnell

customer_reviews.title: A MUST-HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Everything the tv ads says it is! We use it almost every day. Very easy to clean plus nothing sticks to it. It is wonderful for use in our counter-top toaster oven. Best way to bake biscuits I've ever tried. Saves us a lot in electric cost and helps keep the kitchen cooler.
customer_reviews.author: JoeK

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a toaster/convection oven. I purchased this item to be able to use as an air fryer. It does just what I wanted it to do and it is so easy to clean. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to use it for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Linda I. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: It simply works
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to cook French fries, tater tots, pizza rolls, sweet potato chips & even small pizzas. It worked great for everything I have cooked in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joseph A. Morris Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Really Small
customer_reviews.text: I know the dimensions were stated plain and clear...but this is much smaller than I expected. (my fault) That is the reason for 3-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Holden

customer_reviews.title: waste money
customer_reviews.text: I used once then very sticky and easy to get scratches(I am not used hard materials). I couldn't remove stains. I made a big mistake to get this item. I wish I could return and refund money
customer_reviews.author: hitomania

customer_reviews.title: My primary tray & rack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Hamilton Beach toaster oven. Fits perfect and works great. Easy to clean and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: No burnt cookies!  Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and so easy to use. Copper Chef is the best! Great seller
customer_reviews.author: L S

customer_reviews.title: I don't think that I have ever had a non stick surface stain like this. I had to soak it in very ...
customer_reviews.text: The "non stick" cookie sheet is anything but non stick. I used it one time to catch drips from the chicken that I was air frying in my Breville air oven and it is discolored every place that the drippings were. I don't think that I have ever had a non stick surface stain like this. I had to soak it in very hot soapy water 3 times to get the drippings off the pan. Not at all what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked it more if it had been a little larger
customer_reviews.text: The pan is smaller than I expected. I would have liked it more if it had been a little larger. It is okay for 2-3 people maybe but way too small for a family. But works great and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Tarlton

customer_reviews.title: Small Size
customer_reviews.text: Product was smaller than expected. Due to it's size, I thought if not useful for the oven, then maybe for my toaster oven. While the top piece fits into my toaster oven, the bottom tray does not. I would have liked a larger surface area for cooking bigger batches if having to use my large oven.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This unit comes in very handy for many things other than oven dry fry. I have used it for bacon in the oven. Nice addition, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dotti

customer_reviews.title: We have other copper chef items and like them all
customer_reviews.text: We have other copper chef items and like them all. This one is no exception. A little smaller than I thought it would be but ok none the less. Very easy cleanup which my wife likes and cooking with out the grease mess is great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Copper Crispers = CRISPY!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased copper pans and found them SO EASY to clean. The 2 crisper racks are AMAZING!! It definitely does this so I can bake AND NOT have to stop, pull the racks out to turn my food over. WOW! It cuts down on the steps to have a crispy products !!️
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: We especially like this for convection use without having to use oil. Works well with fish, vegetables, battered fish & potatoes. Only slight drawback is the bottom tray dies have some stains.
customer_reviews.author: George1914

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Used first time to reheat leftover tempura and it works great. Really crisped up and didn't over cook the shrimp. Easy to clean. I have the square pan too and love that I can brown and sauté without oil.
customer_reviews.author: d_rich

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well but the specs are slightly off. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooks well but the specs are slightly off. The size of the basket is accurate as listed but it is actually slightly wider because of the handle. Had to take one of the handles off so it would fit snugly into my toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: TheBadDog

customer_reviews.title: Not a fast way to cook
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use in my convection/toaster oven in place of an air fryer. It is a basket and tray which allows air to flow all around the food. An air fryer would have cooked tater tots to a nice crispy texture in less than 20 minutes. This item took 40 minutes to get the same result. I think it is ok if you are not in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sine

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lightweight Crisper Set
customer_reviews.text: Great small crisper. Used the flat pan to cook bacon in the oven and the crisper pan to drain them on. Worked perfectly! Love the light weight and nonstick of the sheet pan. Nice small lightweight set. Use often.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hines

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: this is a good product for a good price. I just got it so I did not fully explore all its benefits but I just noticed that cleaning the mesh top part is slightly tricky. I hope it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE PAUL MCKARY

customer_reviews.title: Delicious results
customer_reviews.text: Love the freshness once the food is cooked on this product! It easy to clean no excess oil or grease on the pan and the food is equally cooked and maintained all the way around! Wish the pan was just slightly larger to cook more items to accommodate a family of four. Great product and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This cooks French fries, onion rings, shrimp, chicken and breaded pork chops evenly. I'm glad I purchased it. It cleans up easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: cjd

customer_reviews.title: Recently purchased some COPPER CHEF and this is a wonderful addition to those pans
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased some COPPER CHEF and this is a wonderful addition to those pans. My honey loves French Fries, (oven cooked) so this will make them more enjoyable for my honey.
customer_reviews.author: Catsroses

product_meta.title: Copper Chef Crisper
product_meta.description: Color:CopperIf you love crispy, golden-brown fried food but want more healthier options we have the solution! Enjoy a Healthier Alternative to Daily Cooking. Now fry or cook food with minimal oil or butter with the Crisper tray which works like an oil-less air fryer, perfect for creating healthier food and preserving taste. There’s no longer a need to buy big and expensive air fryers. Specially designed of two-pieces kitchen set allows heat to circulate 360° around food meaning there’s no need to turn or flip your food while cooking. The circulated air makes food crispy on the outside but juicy and tender on the inside. Box Contains: 1. Ceramic Coated Nonstick Mesh Basket2. Ceramic Coated Nonstick Cookie Sheet (pan)Basket Size 8. 7 X 11. 9 & Tray Size 9. 6 X 12. 8Boost your cooking skills! Better looking and more delicious food – every time! More productivity in the kitchen – easy! What Makes the Crisper So Great?- Non-Stick Technology for easy clean up- MATERIALS-100% PFOS, PTFE and PFOA-free- Fan, gas oven or grills can withstand temperatures up to 850°F- Shaped Metal Handles for easy grip- 360 Degrees of Cooking- Dishwasher SafeWhether cooking a simple dinner for family or hosting friends, Copper Chef will make cooking a cinch. Vegetarians and meat-eaters agree, the copper crisper suits everyone! So. . . Why wait?
feature_bullets: HOW DOES IT WORK? Transform your oven into an air fryer with Copper Crisper set. The kit features a non-stick mesh basket 12 X 9 that sits atop a non stick cookie sheet 13 X 9. Elevated ceramic coated nonstick wire basket with a sturdy stainless steel rim allows heated air to pass through and circulate a full 360 F. which cooks all sides of your food at the same time. Circulates air around make your food crispy on the outside but juicy and tender on the inside.

WHAT IS IT FOR? This crisper is perfect for making french fries, onion rings, chicken strips, roast vegetables, pizzas, cookies, biscuits, fish, mozzarella sticks, pork, corn dogs, prawns, broccoli and much more with the best texture as possible.

COOKING HEALTHY MEALS FOR YOUR FAMILY. No-stick ceramic coating allows you to cook without extra butter, oil and chemicals, which reduce calories and fat. Oil-less airbake in the oven is an excellent alternative to conventional frying methods and ideal for people with special diets who want to reduce their cholesterol levels or extra calories. Also all microelements stay in your ingredients and do not disappear, which increases the amount of vitamins you get from your eating. Create delicious, healthier fried treats from your cookbook.

CLEAN UP EASILY. Copper Crisper is dishwasher safe so just place both parts into the dish washer or wipe down with a cloth for a quick cleaning. Also an oven tray catches crumbs, any grease, drippings and loose spills to keep your oven clean & safe.

COOK WITH A SMILE because cooking became easier! Now you can bake, fry and roast your favorite dishes all with the same set every day. Forget about turning & flipping and burning when cooking. Special coating ensures no food sticks to the surface and air circulation reduces chances of food burning, it gives perfectly crispy, golden-brown results. Throw out the foil and parchment, you will not need them any more. This amazing kitchen tool is very lightweight and suitable for any fan or gas oven or under the grill.
